name: columnValueMeanToBeBetween
displayName: Column Value Mean To Be Between
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValueMeanToBeBetween. Test the mean value in a col is within a range.

parameterDefinition.name: minValueForMeanInCol
parameterDefinition.description: Expected mean value for the column to be greater or equal than

parameterDefinition.name: maxValueForMeanInCol
parameterDefinition.description: Expected mean value for the column to be lower or equal than
